articles.title: Experts slam 'pittance' in aid to Pakistan as they find climate crisis played a role in floods - CNN
articles.description: An analysis of Pakistan's devastating floods has found "fingerprints" of the human-made climate crisis on the disaster, which killed more than 1,500 people and destroyed so much land and infrastructure it has plunged the South Asian nation into crisis.
